remarks: Define set of all closed projective subspaces, which are those sets of atoms that equal their double polarity.  Based on definition in [Holland95] p. 223.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Jan-2012.)
statement:
df-psubclN $p |- PSubCl = ( k e. _V |-> { s | ( s C_ ( Atoms ` k ) /\ ( ( _|_P ` k ) ` ( ( _|_P ` k ) ` s ) ) = s ) } ) $.
$d k s $.
